attributes.action: call a General Election before the end of the year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British people are tired of oppressive socialism, denigration of British culture through multiculturalism, suppression of free speech by political correctness, being sold out to the EU, high taxes, government inefficiency and lack of accountabilty, and want a General Election to achieve change before the end of the year.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
